alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Greene (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 19 at 4:52PM EST until January 19 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EST FOR NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHERN CLINTON...SOUTHEASTERN CLARK... EASTERN GREENE AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 451 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wilmington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Xenia, Wilmington, Yellow Springs, Cedarville, Sabina, Jamestown, South Charleston, Jeffersonville, Wilberforce, Lisbon, New Jasper, Brighton, South Vienna, South Solon, Bowersville, Port William, Clifton, Milledgeville and Octa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
